#summary Description of Character Controls

= Introduction =
The following article describes player controls for the XNA game Bugzzz.


= Details =
*Movement*
  * Player Movement:
      Use the left joystick to move the player around the screen
  * Turret Movement: 
      To use the turret, press the right joystick in the direction you want to fire. 

*Other Controls*
  * A Button - Deploy Turret
  * D-Pad Up - Open Player Menu
    - While menu Open
      * Right Bumper - Rotate to right through Weapons
      * Left Bumper - Rotate to left through Weapons
  * D-Pad Down - Close Player Menu
  * B Button - Activate Player Menu Spell
